sentences.sContent: Introduce the tube into that conduit, please.
sentences.sContent_eng: Introduce the tube into that conduit, please.
sentences.sCn: 请把电线插入那个导管内。

sentences.sContent: Secure the payload and base ends of the conduit using fittings removed previously.
sentences.sContent_eng: Secure the payload and base ends of the conduit using fittings removed previously.
sentences.sCn: 使用先前卸下来的配件将导管的有效负载端和底端固定住。

sentences.sContent: Apply a non-hardening sealant to the threads of the terminal box connection port flexible metal conduit and seal fitting for waterproofing.
sentences.sContent_eng: Apply a non-hardening sealant to the threads of the terminal box connection port flexible metal conduit and seal fitting for waterproofing.
sentences.sCn: 在接线盒连接口、挠性金属导管及密封件螺纹处涂上非硬化密封剂，用于防水。

phrases.pCn: 导管系统；暗线装置系统

trans.tranOther: a pipe or passage through which water, gas, a set of electric wires etc passes
